Headline: #95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Union
ShortDescription: 95 95th, 112 Vincennes/111th buses rrtd EB: 95th,Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, & 95th; WB: 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th due to street blockage nr 95th/Union.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th, #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Union due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
